data.question: What is the publication year of the article discussing the humidity-controlled reversible structure transition of disodium adenosine 5'-triphosphate?
Which journal published the article with the DOI 10.1021/ja00014a041?
data.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society

data.question: Who are the authors of the study on humidity-controlled reversible structure transition of disodium adenosine 5'-triphosphate?
data.answer: Yoko Sugawara, Nobuo Kamiya, Hitoshi Iwasaki, Tetsuzo Ito, Yoshinori Satow

data.question: What is the main focus of the article with the DOI 10.1021/ja00014a041?
data.answer: Humidity-controlled reversible structure transition of disodium adenosine 5'-triphosphate between dihydrate and trihydrate in a single crystal state

data.question: How can one access the supporting information for the article published in J. Am. Chem. Soc., 1991, 113(14), 5440-5445?
data.answer: Supporting Information files are available without a subscription to ACS Web Editions.

data.question: What are the copyright terms for using the supporting information provided by the American Chemical Society for the article with DOI 10.1021/ja00014a041?
data.answer: Files may be downloaded for personal use only and users are not permitted to reproduce, republish, redistribute, or sell any Supporting Information without permission from the American Chemical Society.
